thread.section_title: News24, South Africa's premier news source, provides breaking news on national, world, Africa, sport, entertainment, technology & more.
thread.title: Removing Comments

author: news24.com
title: Removing Comments
text:
People are generally egocentric and judgmental when it comes to news and events in their own space. News24 brings news and events into their space.
News24 readers are varied; some educated, and some not so educated. The vast array of readers is a testimony to the reporting ability of News24. People Read. People Comment. People are rude. People are offended.
Life can be offensive. Life is never rude.
People who are rude need to be deleted and prevented from engaging on the public arena that is News24.
To be deliberately rude and deliberately offensive, and to incite anger amongst fellow readers is unfair, unconstitutional and uncouth.
